title: Iridiana
content:
Iridiana owns The Color Wheel, a clothing dye shop located in Hopeforest. In her shop players can dye armor pieces one of 20 different colors.


 * If you tell her you wish to dye some armor, she references warnings found on clothing tags and laundry products, saying "Warning: Not suitable for tumble drying, colors may run, always test on a small area first."
